pages.text: $(li)The Nether Wastes is a barren biome composed of mostly Netherrack.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Nether,$(br)$(li)You can find Planted Quartz and Netherrack Speleothem here.

$(li)Some creatures like $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/zombified_piglin)Zombified Piglins$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/piglin)Piglins$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/ghast)Ghasts$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/magma_cube)Magma Cubes$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/enderman)Endermans$(/l), and $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/strider)Striders$(/l) can be found here too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the words $(l)Nether Wastes$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
